data.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

data.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
data.description: The first book of the Harry Potter saga. Harry Potter enrolls into Hogwarts, meets Ron Weasly and Hermoine Granger and Sir ALbus DumbelDore and Severus Snape.

data.description: The third book of the Harry Potter saga. Harry potter gets chosen as one of the candidates for strongest wizard in the tri cup

data.title: Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince
data.description: The third book of the Harry Potter saga. Harry finds that Snape is the half blood prince
